issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: We now have hive.compute.query.using.stats=false by default. We plan to turn it on by default so that we can have better performance. We can also set it to false in some test cases to maintain the original purpose of those tests..

fields.summary: Stats state is not captured correctly in dynpart_sort_optimization_acid.q

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

fields.summary: Set basic stats as inaccurate for all ACID tables

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Disable StatsOptimizer for all ACID tables

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
